attribute.name: code
attribute.tooltip: The source code corresponding to this join point

attribute.name: ast
attribute.tooltip: A string representation of the AST corresponding to this node

attribute.name: numChildren
attribute.tooltip: Returns the number of children of the node

attribute.name: children
attribute.tooltip: Returns an array with the children of the node

attribute.name: child
attribute.tooltip: Returns the child of the node at the given index

attribute.name: isStatement
attribute.tooltip: true if this node is considered a statement

attribute.name: isBlock
attribute.tooltip: true if this node is considered a block of statements

attribute.name: modifiers
attribute.tooltip: an array of modifiers (e.g., final, static) applied to this node. If no modifiers are applied, or if the node does not support modifiers, returns an empty array

attribute.name: name
attribute.tooltip: the simple name of the class

attribute.name: qualifiedName
attribute.tooltip: the qualified name of this class, includes packages
